title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Unbound (Pune) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Telephonic and then video round.It was relevant . Also they should give feedback but they just disappeared......it was an average interview process..... .  ..    .    .....

title: Sponsor Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Unbound (New York, NY) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview was with a group of four managers and HR asking you questions about previous work history. It was easy going and the employees seemed nice and pleasant. Had another option that offered higher pay.
Interview Questions: why would you be a good fit for the organization?

title: Bilingual Phone Liaison Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Unbound (Kansas City, MO) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: easy, comfortable. every one was really friendly and it was a welcoming environment. it was with the managers and directors in the department and they kept it pretty casual. For a panel interview, it wasn't intimidating.
Interview Questions: how comfortable i was with my spanish
